hero.title: New Career Pathways for Students
hero.intro: Chaminade University and Pacific University partner to provide students with new opportunities to pursue careers in health professionsâ€¦

articles.title: Healthcare with Cultural Sensitivity
articles.intro: School of Nursing students provided health screenings and wellness education while learning how to be sensitive to Native Hawaiian culture.

articles.title: A Night of Leadership Lessons and Networking
articles.intro: The Hogan Entrepreneurs Kick-Off provided students the opportunity to meet business leaders and learn about 'spiritual confidence.'

articles.title: The Show Goes On
articles.intro: Showcasing their talents, the Pacific Islander Cultural clubs celebrated diversity through performances at the annual Pacific Island Review event.

articles.title: The Office of the Rector Needs Your Help
articles.intro: Do you know someone in the Chaminade `ohana who exhibits a continuous commitment to Marianist values? If so, nominate them for the 2017 Heritage Awards.

articles.title: 'All Things Marianist' Episode 2
articles.intro: Chaminade Dean of Humanities and Performing Arts, David Coleman, interviews Chaminade rector emeritus, Bro. Jerome Bommer, SM.

events.title: 2018 Maui Jim Maui Invitational
events.intro: For the first time in the tournament's history, eight Division I programs take center court.

events.title: All Souls Mass
events.intro: Gather with the community to remember those who have died and to pray as a community for peace and healing.

events.title: Campus Survey Ends Nov. 4
events.intro: Aramark Dining Services invites you to take its survey so that it can better understand our campus lifestyle and preferences.

events.title: Men's Basketball vs New Zealand Maori Exhibition Game
events.intro: Friday, Nov. 4, at 7:30pm in McCabe Gym

events.title: WIT
events.intro: Chaminade Performing Arts presents Margaret Edson's Pulitzer prize winning play.
